verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a <S%G243><s%> mighty <S%G2478><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> coming down <S%G2597><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the sky, <S%G3772><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> with a cloud. <S%G3507><s%> <S%G2532><s%> A rainbow <S%G2463><s%> was on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head. <S%G2776><s%> <S%G2532><s%> His <S%G846><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> was like <S%G5613><s%> the sun, <S%G2246><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> pillars <S%G4769><s%> of fire. <S%G4442><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He had <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> a little open <S%G455><s%> book. <S%G974><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He set <S%G5087><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> his left <S%G2176><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the land. <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> a lion <S%G3023><s%> roars. <S%G3455><s%> <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> he cried, <S%G2896><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> uttered <S%G2980><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> voices. <S%G5456><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> sounded, <S%G2980><s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G5456><s%> I was about <S%G3195><s%> to write; <S%G1125><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the sky <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3427><s%> "Seal up <S%G4972><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> said, <S%G2980><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> them. <S%G5023><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The angel <S%G32><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> lifted up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right hand <S%G5495><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the sky, <S%G3772><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> swore <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him who <S%G3739><s%> lives <S%G2198><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever, <S%G165><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the things that are in <S%G1722><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the things that are in <S%G1722><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the things that are in <S%G1722><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> there will no <S%G3756><s%> longer <S%G2089><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> delay, <S%G5550><s%>

but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he is about <S%G3195><s%> to sound, <S%G4537><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is finished, <S%G5055><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> he declared <S%G2097><s%> to his <S%G1438><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The voice <S%G5456><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> <S%G3825><s%> <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Go, <S%G5217><s%> take <S%G2983><s%> the book <S%G974><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is open <S%G455><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the hand <S%G5495><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> stands <S%G2476><s%> on the sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the land. <S%G1093><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I went <S%G565><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the angel, <S%G32><s%> telling <S%G3004><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> the little book. <S%G974><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> "Take <S%G2983><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> and eat <S%G2719><s%> it <S%G846><s%> up. <S%G2719><s%> <S%G2532><s%> It will make <S%G4087><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> stomach <S%G2836><s%> bitter, <S%G4087><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> it will be <S%G2071><s%> as sweet <S%G1099><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> honey. <S%G3192><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I took <S%G2983><s%> the little book <S%G974><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%>'s hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ate <S%G2719><s%> it <S%G846><s%> up. <S%G2719><s%> It was <S%G2258><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> sweet <S%G1099><s%> as <S%G3753><s%> honey <S%G3192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth. <S%G4750><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> I had eaten <S%G5315><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> stomach <S%G2836><s%> was made bitter. <S%G4087><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They told <S%G3004><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> "You <S%G4571><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> peoples, <S%G2992><s%> <S%G2532><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> <S%G2532><s%> languages, <S%G1100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kings. <S%G935><s%>"
